author.name: tvN
author.bio: A South Korean nationwide pay television network owned by the E&M Division of CJ E&M.

node.title: Vincenzo
node.excerpt: Vincenzo Cassano, a South Korean-born Mafia lawyer in Italy, flees to his homeland after he finds himself caught in between two warring factions.

node.title: Reply 1988
node.excerpt: Five childhood friends who live in the same neighborhood of Ssangmundong rely on each other as they enter the peak of their turbulent teen years.

node.title: Crash Landing on You
node.excerpt: The lives of a South Korean heiress and a North Korean military officer collide when the former lands into North Korean territory after a paragliding accident.
